title: Bare Land on Horana - Uduwa
details:
Land Facing to Horana – Kuda Uduwa Bus root (315/1)
Clear deeds & approved plan.
Near to Horana Pradeshiya saba. (3KM)
6 KM to Horana Town
12 Km from NSBM /Mahinda Rajapaksha national school
15 Km from Mahinda Rajapaksha stadium
1 KM to Kuda Uduwa Junction (Padukka – Horana Road)
11.3 Perch bare land.
85,000 P.P (negotiable)
Good residential area especially for those interested in peaceful and quiet living.
Genuine buyers only.
